publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1638 Frank Mulholland: Fatal Accident Inquiries—That the Parliament welcomes the review of the Fatal Accidents and Sudden Deaths Inquiry (Scotland) Act 1976, to be led by Lord Cullen of Whitekirk, which will ensure that Scotland has an effective and practical system of public inquiry into deaths which is fit for the 21st century. Supported by: Kenny MacAskill*
